content: this legal text is about dividing assets among multiple parties the assets include apartments storage rooms and plots of land in a specific municipality the parties involved are identified by initials the text provides details about each property such as its category class size and value the assets are divided equally among the parties with each party receiving ownership of certain properties the value of each partys share is also mentioned the text ends by mentioning a sale but doesnt provide any further information about it

metadata.subject_of_succession: apartments, storage rooms, plots of land
